definition: a burrowing monotreme mammal covered with spines and having a long snout and claws for hunting ants and termites
details:
noun
- a burrowing monotreme mammal covered with spines and having a long snout and claws for hunting ants and termites
= synonyms: echidna
- a burrowing monotreme mammal covered with spines and having a long snout and claws for hunting ants and termites
= synonyms: echidna
- small Australian marsupial having long snout and strong claws for feeding on termites
= synonyms: numbat
- nocturnal burrowing mammal of the grasslands of Africa that feeds on termites
= synonyms: aardvark, ant bear
- any of several tropical American mammals of the family Myrmecophagidae which lack teeth and feed on ants and termites
- toothless mammal of southern Africa and Asia having a body covered with horny scales and a long snout for feeding on ants and termites
= synonyms: pangolin, scaly anteater
